text: Jan Lityński (18 January 1946 – 21 February 2021) was a Polish politician, journalist, and opposition activist. He was a member of the Sejm between 1989 and 2001. Lityński died on 21 February 2021 in Warsaw, aged 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Polish politicians
title: Jan Lityński
